name: REI_RES_PERSONNEL_SPEC
description: The REI_RES_PERSONNEL_SPEC table contains information about the specimens that a person was responsible for when doing a task for an embryology procedure or result.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the result record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: RESP_SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The specimens that the associated person was responsible for the associated responsibility. If not specified, the person is considered responsible for all specimens on the embryology result for the associated responsibility.
